str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To cooperate with, work together. From sunergos; to be a fellow-worker, i.e. Co-operate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
